mapper.select: select * from cpu where ip = #{ip} order by time desc
select * from memory where ip = #{ip} order by time desc
select ip,ifDescr from interface where ip = #{ip}
select * from InterFlow where ip = #{ip} and interDescr = #{interDescr}
select ip , name from system where sysObjectID <> 'SNMP未响应'

select ip,time,round(sum(inFlow),2) as inFlow,round(sum(outFlow),2) as outFlow,round(sum(inLoss),2) as inLoss,round(sum(outLoss),2) as outLoss,round(sum(inRate),2) as inRate,round(sum(outRate)) as outRate,round(sum(inErrorRate),2) as inErrorRate,round(sum(outErrorRate),2) as outErrorRate from InterFlow where ip = #{ip} group by ip,time
